messages.msgSnippet: ... bunch of ... Yes, we watched that, which led us to also check out the Maurice Sendak Video Library, which I love, and Eric Carle s The Very Hungry
messages.messageBody:
> We rented a DVD with an animated version of the book - along with a
bunch of
> other older cartoons which were wonderful! Highly recommend it.<

Yes, we watched that, which led us to also check out the Maurice
Sendak Video Library, which I love, and Eric Carle's The Very Hungry
Caterpillar and Other Stories on video, which my son adores. They're
due back at the library today and I'm already sad that they have to
go back.

Sorcha

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Chicka Chicka Boom Boom
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/7/2003 11:50:42 AM Central Standard Time, ... We rented a DVD with an animated version of the book - along with a bunch of other older
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/7/2003 11:50:42 AM Central Standard Time,
sorcha-aisling@... writes:


> May I suggest that you run to your library and find Chicka Chicka Boom
> Boom. It's the most adorable alphabet book ever

We rented a DVD with an animated version of the book - along with a bunch of
other older cartoons which were wonderful! Highly recommend it. Now I can't
get the song out of my head, even though I'm about 300 emails behind.

Elizabeth
